system.effect: Large Weapon and Ammo Stockpile. +25 Achievement Points towards Military Objectives and all Macrobatteries have +1 Damage. If component is damaged, it explodes, doing 2d5 Hull Integrity damage, another component of GM's choice is set on fire. Only one per vessel.
